document_data.mainbody:
Clethtinthtiallor Zarjhan was a dragonborn of Tymanther and the patriarch of Clan Clethtinthtiallor in 1487 DR.
Zarjhan had rust scales.
In 1487 DR, Zarjhan was one of the clan elders who supported the decision to allow Namshitas refugees to live in Tymanther, in gratitude for Namshitas role in the liberation of members of Clan Clethtinthtiallor that had being enslaved by Gilgeam after the return of Unther to Toril.
